item.title: A Starting Point for Hermeneutics
item.description: Definitions and Objectives Before jumping into the post, let me first define a couple of the phrases in the abstract. “common-sense starting point” To clarify the objective of this blog post, I am not seeking to establish a complete and robust foundation for a hermeneutic. This is why I’m calling it a “common-sense starting point”; this blog post takes for granted many philosophical assumptions. While I do not deny defending my presuppositions would be a useful endeavor, I am not going to undertake it here.
